citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:02 PM on
8/12/2025. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee by knocking on the door and calling a facility representative
who stated no one was available for an inspection today. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for
inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:02 PM on 
8/12/2025. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee by knocking on the door and calling a facility representative 
who stated no one was available for an inspection today. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for 
inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action. 
 
 
End Section
